content: A method can have both normal parameters and a variable parameter but the variable parameter must always be the last parameter. For instance, if the programmer is required to use a minimum number of parameters, those parameters can be specified before the variable argument:
stemmed: A method normal paramet variabl paramet variabl paramet must alway last paramet . for instanc , programm requir use minimum number paramet , paramet specifi variabl argument :
